sqlMap.select: select * from qna_board order by qna_no desc
sqlMap.update: update qna_board set title=#title#, content=#content#, create_date=sysdate where qna_no=#qna_no#
sqlMap.insert: insert into qna_board(qna_no, mem_id, title, content, create_date) values(qna_board_no_seq.nextval, #mem_id#, #title#, #content#, sysdate)
